TEXT.TITLE: <KIDSTON GOLD MINES LTD> 1986 YEAR
TEXT.BODY: Shr 48.4 cents vs 40.6 Yr div 37 cents vs 15 Net 60.50 mln dlrs vs 50.76 mln Turnover 134.54 mln vs 100.63 mln Other income 1.02 mln vs 920,000 Shrs 125 mln vs same. NOTE - Company paid total 37 cents in previously declared quarterly divs vs 15. Net is after tax 173,000 dlrs vs 285,000, interest 9.67 mln vs 8.05 mln and depreciation 11.76 mln vs 9.59 mln. REUTER
